info.name: Gmail Short Date+Time in Mail List
info.description: Short formatted date and time version of Gmail Date+Time in Mail List. Thanks for some great feedbacks, we updated CSS. Support English (US), English (UK), Japanese, Español, Deutsch and Chihese. If you find something wrong, please give us feedback. Before: - Aug 14 - 12:34 pm After: - Aug 14 12:34 pm -------------------------------------------------- Gmail Date+Time in Mail Listの短い表示のバージョンです。フィードバックを参考にしてCSSを書き換えました。 English (US), English (UK), 日本語, スペイン語, ドイツ語, 中国語に対応しています。
info.additionalInfo:
2018-09-15 add support for new look 2018 of English (UK), Japanese, Español
2018-07-18 add support for 1 digit day on new look 2018
2018-06-23 fix date time width
2018-06-17 add support for gMail new look 2018
2017-10-08 fix schedule attachment image position, add trial support for Chinese [中文]
2017-09-12 add trial support for Gmail display language: Español, Deutsch
2017-09-09 add support for Gmail display language: English (UK), Japanese [日本語]
2017-08-31 remove comma from 1 digit day
2017-08-26 fixed overflow of date time text, make AM and PM lowercase, remove duplicated properties
2017-08-14 the 1st release.

data.title: needs a little work for the new gmail
